targets.expr: histogram_quantile(1, sum(rate(cxc_dm_process_message_duration_seconds_bucket{cloud=~"${cloud}",environment=~"${environment}",location=~"${location}",pod=~"$pod",tenant_name=~"$tenant_name", media=~"$media"}[$interval])) by (le,tenant_name,media)) or on() vector(0)

histogram_quantile(1, sum(rate(cxc_dm_batch_size_bucket{cloud=~"${cloud}",environment=~"${environment}",location=~"${location}",pod=~"$pod",tenant_name=~"$tenant_name", media=~"$media"}[$interval])) by (le,tenant_name,media)) or on() vector(0)

sum(increase(cxc_dm_test_messages_total{cloud=~"${cloud}",environment=~"${environment}",location=~"${location}",pod=~"$pod",tenant_name=~"$tenant_name", media=~"$media"}[$interval])) by (tenant_name, media) or on() vector(0)

sum(increase(cxc_dm_failed_test_messages_total{cloud=~"${cloud}",environment=~"${environment}",location=~"${location}",pod=~"$pod",tenant_name=~"$tenant_name", media=~"$media"}[$interval])) by (tenant_name, media) or on() vector(0)

panels.description: Returns 0 if there is no connections to nexus or number of established connections. The max number of connections described by option socketPoolSize in dial section
